net.kuujo.vertigo.io

Interface InputCollector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Closeable<InputCollector>, IOCollector<InputCollector>, Openable<InputCollector>

    public interface InputCollector
extends IOCollector<InputCollector>
    Interface for receiving messages on input ports.

    The input collector is the primary interface for receiving input within a component instance. Input collectors are simple wrappers around InputPort instances.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputPort port(String name)
      Returns an input port.
      Collection<InputPort> ports()
      Returns a collection of input ports.

    • Method Detail

      • ports

        Collection<InputPort> ports()
        Returns a collection of input ports.
        Returns:
        A collection of input ports.

      • port

        InputPort port(String name)
        Returns an input port.

        If the port doesn't already exist then the input collector will lazily create the port. Ports can be referenced prior to the input event starting up, and once the input starts ports will be properly configured.

        Specified by:
        port in interface IOCollector<InputCollector>
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the port to load.
        Returns:
        The input port.
